Room.Name: Deni's World of Spices
Room.ShortDescription: Rare herbs and spices are always a commodity in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: Some spices are said to have magical or mystical powers associated with them. Most, however, are just used for seasonings or to preserve meats. There are shelves upon shelves of herbs and spices along the walls, most of which you've never seen before.
